objects.text:
2 Star Energy Rating
Direct-Cool Technology
Wine Bloom-Z Premium Design
Toughened Glass Shelves

product_details.name: Whirlpool 184 L 2 Star Direct-Cool Single Door Refrigerator (205 WDE PRM 2S WINE BLOOM-Z)
product_details.description: Brand: Whirlpool. Model: 205 WDE PRM 2S. Capacity: 184 litres. Annual Energy Consumption: 190 Kilowatt Hours Per Year. Refrigerator Fresh Food Capacity: 169.2 litres. Freezer Capacity: 14.3 Litres. Bottle Count: 6. Installation Type: Freestanding. Part Number: 72680. Form Factor: Stand Alone. Special Features: Door lock. Colour: Wine Bloom-Z. Voltage: 220. Number of Drawers: 4. Defrost System: Automatic. Door Orientation: Left. Door Material: Stainless Steel. Shelf Type: Toughened Glass. Number of Shelves: 2. Certification: Energy Rating. Material: Stainless Steel. Batteries Required: No. Country of Origin: India. Importer: Whirlpool of India Ltd. Plot No. A-4, MIDC Ranjangaon,Taluka Shirur, Dist: Pune, Maharashtra 412220, India, Email - helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com ; Toll Free - 1800 208 1800. Item Weight: 33 kg 400 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 65.1 x 53.5 x 118.8 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1 Count. Generic Name: Refrigerator.

banner_details:
The banner design showcases a modern, sleek promotional layout for a single door refrigerator. It features a structured composition: the product image is prominently placed on the right side (`product_image`), showcasing a vibrant design that grabs attention. On the left, text layers are arranged vertically with a bold headline (`heading`) at the top, followed by a subheading (`subheading`) introducing the product category. Below that, a list of key features is presented in a compact format (`description`). The pricing is highlighted in a large font (`price`), accompanied by a rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with inviting text (`cta`). The background includes soft overlays, decorative lines, and rounded rectangles to give a clean, layered appearance, enhancing depth and visual flow.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Beige: `#F5EDE9` (background)
- Deep Burgundy: `#6D1A36` (headline, CTA button)
- Berry Red: `#9D2C4E` (subheading)
- Wine Brown: `#592029` (description text)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (CTA text)
- Light Pink Overlay: `#E8B4C2` (background accents)
product_color: The product image features a rich, visually captivating floral design on a refrigerator, using a luxurious blend of magenta, crimson, deep plum, and violet hues. The background is a sophisticated gradient of deep burgundy (#4C1036) fading into plum (#6F1B52), allowing the vibrant flowers to stand out. Floral elements showcase highlights of fuchsia (#F72585), coral pink (#FB6F92), soft lavender (#A066D3), and baby blue (#B4DDFC), which are smoothly blended to give a luminous, ethereal glow. The color transitions are seamless, creating a sense of depth and elegance, ideal for a banner with an enchanting, premium, and feminine appeal.
